Sentencas: In this work, we investigated the performance and stability of a large flat-tube SOFC with symmetric double-sided cathodes (DSC), which was directly fueled with methane.
Titulo: Performance and long-term durability of direct-methane flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells with symmetric double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: The effect of steam/carbon (S/C) ratio, temperature, and current density on the performance, and long-term stability of the DSC as well as the catalytic behavior of the anode was investigated in details.
Titulo: Performance and long-term durability of direct-methane flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells with symmetric double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: The thick anode support and inner channels of the DSC formed an efficient micro-reactor for steam-reforming of methane, resulting in high conversion rate of methane and CO selectivity.
Titulo: Performance and long-term durability of direct-methane flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells with symmetric double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: In particular, when the S/C was 2, the conversion of CH4 at 750 degrees C achieved 100% in the DSC and no carbon deposition was observed.
Titulo: Performance and long-term durability of direct-methane flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells with symmetric double-sided cathodes

Sentencas: Moreover, the voltage of DSC with was stable throughout 190 h under a discharge current density of 0.257 A cm(-2).
Titulo: Performance and long-term durability of direct-methane flat-tube solid oxide fuel cells with symmetric double-sided cathodes
